errors.error_description: The installation command includes `pytest-n`, which is an unnecessary and non-existent package.
correction_candidates: Change `pip install pytest-xdist pytest-n` to `pip install pytest-xdist`.
Change `pip install pytest-xdist pytest-n` to `pip install pytest pytest-xdist`.
Change `pip install pytest-xdist pytest-n` to `pip install 'pytest-xdist[n]'`.
Run the commands separately: `pip install pytest-xdist` and then `pip install pytest-n`.
errors.golden_answer: Change `pip install pytest-xdist pytest-n` to `pip install pytest-xdist`.
